name: Akhorne The Squirrel
specialRules: Blind Rage: Akhorne may choose to re-roll the D6 when rolling for the Dauntless sill.

name: Barik Farblast
specialRules: Blast It!: Once per game, when Barik makes a Hail Mary Pass, he may re-roll any scatter results for determining where the ball lands, and any friendly player attempting to catch the ball gains an additional +1 modifier to the roll.

name: The Black Gobbo
specialRules: Sneakiest of the Lot: If your team includes the Black Gobbo, you may commit two Foul actions per turn, provided one of your Foul actions is committed by the Black Gobbo himself.

name: Bomber Dribblesnot
specialRules: Kaboom: Once per game, if an opposition player catches a Bomb thrown by Bomber, you can choose to have it explode immediately rather than rolling to see if the player can throw it again.

name: Bryce ‘The Slice’ Cambuel
specialRules: Ghostly Flames: Once per half, when Bryce makes the Chainsaw Attack Special action as part of a Blitz action, he may add +4 to the Armor roll against an opponent rather than +3.

name: Deeproot Strongbranch
specialRules: Reliable: If Deeproot fumbles a Throw Team-mate action, the player that was thrown will bounce as normal but will automatically land safely.

name: Eldril Sidewinder
specialRules: Mesmerizing Dance: Once per game, Eldril may re-roll a failed Agility test when attempting to use the Hypnotic Gaze trait.

name: Fungus the Loon
specialRules: Whirling Dervish: Once per activation, Fungus may re-roll the D6 when determining which direction he moves in.

name: Glart Smashrip
specialRules: Frenzied Rush: Once per game, when Glart performs a Blitz action, he may gain the Frenzy skill. You must declare this special rule is being used when Glart is activated. Glart may not use the Grab skill during a turn in which he uses this special rule.

name: Gloriel Summerbloom
specialRules: Shot to Nothing: Once per game, when Gloriel performs a Pass action, she may gain the Hail Mary Pass skill. You must declare this special rule is being used when Gloriel is activated.

name: Grak
specialRules: Two for One: Grak and Crumbleberry must be hired as a pair and count as two Star Players. However, if either Grak or Crumbleberry is removed from play due to sufferign a KO'd or Casualty! result on the Injury table, the other replaces the Loner (4+) trait with the Loner (2+) trait.

name: Crumbleberry
specialRules: Two for One: Grak and Crumbleberry must be hired as a pair and count as two Star Players. However, if either Grak or Crumbleberry is removed from play due to sufferign a KO'd or Casualty! result on the Injury table, the other replaces the Loner (4+) trait with the Loner (2+) trait.

name: Grashnak Blackhoof
specialRules: Gored by the Bull: Once per game, when Grashnak performs a Blitz action, Grashnak may roll one additional Block dice against the opposition player, regardless of the opposition player's Strength, to a maximum of three Block dice. If Grashnak performs a second Block action due to the Frenzy skill, this second Block action will also benefit from this rule.

name: Gretchen Wachter “The Blood Bowl Widow”
specialRules: Incorporeal: Once per game, after making an Agility test to dodge, Gretchen may choose to modify the dice roll by adding her strength characteristic to it.

name: Griff Oberwald
specialRules: Consummate Professional: Once per game, Griff may re-roll one dice that was rolled either as a single dice roll, as a part of a multiple dice roll, or as a part of a dice pool (this cannot be a dice that was rolled as a part of an Armor, Injury, or Casualty roll).

name: Grim Ironjaw
specialRules: Slayer: Once per game, when an opposition player with a Strength characteristic of 5 or more is Knocked Down as a result of a Block action performed by Grim, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to either the Armor roll or Injury roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Frank ‘n’ Stein
specialRules: Brutal Block: Once per game, when Frank 'n' Stein makes in Injury roll against an opponent as a result of a Block action, he may choose to add an additional +1 modifier to the Injury roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Hakflem Skuttlespike
specialRules: Treacherous: Once per game, if a team-mate in an adjacent square to Hakflem is in posession of the ball when Hakflem is activated, that player may immediately be Knocked Down and Hakflem may take posession of the ball. No Turnover is caused as a result of using this special rule.

name: Helmut Wolf
specialRules: Old Pro: Once per game, Helmut may use his Pro sill to re-roll a single dice rolled as part of an Armor roll.

name: Karla Von Kill
specialRules: Indomitable: Once per game, when Karla successfully rolls to use her Dauntless skill, she may increase her Strength characteristc to double that of the nominated target of her Block action.

name: Kreek Rustgouger
specialRules: I'll Be Back: The first time in a game that Kreek Rustgouger would be Sent-off as per the secret weapon trait, he is not Sent-off and instead may continue as part of the game.

name: Lord Borak The Despoiler
specialRules: Lord of Chaos: A team that includes Lord Borak gains an extra Team re-roll for the first half of the game. If this Team re-roll is not used during the first half, it may be carried over into the second half. However, if Lord Borak is removed from play before this re-roll is used, it is lost.

name: Max Spleenripper
specialRules: Maximum Carnage: Once per game, after Max performs a Chainsaw Attack Special action, he may immediately perform another Chainsaw Attack Special action that targets a different opposition player.

name: Mighty Zug
specialRules: Crushing Blow: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as a result of a Block action performed by Zug, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Armor roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Morg ‘n’ Thorg
specialRules: The Ballista: Once per game, if Morg fails the Passing Ability test when making a Pass action or a Throw team-mate action, you may re-roll the D6.

name: Roxanna Darknail
specialRules: Burst of Speed: Once per game, Roxanna may attempt to Rush three times, rather than the usual two. You may declare you are using this special rule after Roxanna has rushed twice.

name: Rumbelow Sheepskin
specialRules: Ram: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as a result of a Block action performed by Rumbelow, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to either the Armor or Injury roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Scyla Anfingrimm
specialRules: Fury of the Blood God: Once per game, if Scyla rolls a 1 for his Unchannelled Fury roll after declaring a Block action, instead of applying the usual effects of Unchannelled Fury, Scyla may perform two Block actions instead.

name: Skrull Halfheight
specialRules: Strong Passing Game: Once per game, after making a Passing Ability test to perform a Pass action, Skrull may choose to modify the dice roll by adding his strength characteristic to it.

name: Lucian Swift
specialRules: Two for One: The Swift Twins must be hired as a pair and count as two Star Players. However, if either Lucien or Valen is removed from play due to sufferign a KO'd or Casualty! result on the Injury table, the other replaces the Loner (4+) trait with the Loner (2+) trait.

name: Valen Swift
specialRules: Two for One: The Swift Twins must be hired as a pair and count as two Star Players. However, if either Lucien or Valen is removed from play due to sufferign a KO'd or Casualty! result on the Injury table, the other replaces the Loner (4+) trait with the Loner (2+) trait.

name: Varag Ghoul-Chewer
specialRules: Crushing Blow: Once per game, when an opposition player is Knocked Down as a result of a Block action performed by Varag, you may apply an additional +1 modifier to the Armor roll. This modifier may be applied after the roll has been made.

name: Grombrindal, the White Dwarf
specialRules: Wisdom of the White Dwarf: One per team turn, when one of Grombrindal's team-mates that is in an adjacent square is activated, that player gains either the Break Tackle, Dauntless, Mighty Blow (+1), or Sure Feet skill until the end of their activation.

name: Wilhelm Chaney
specialRules: Savage Mauling: Once per game, when Wilhelm makes an Injury roll against an opposing player, he may choose to re-roll the result.

name: Willow Rosebark
specialRules: Indomitable: Once per game, when Willow successfully rolls to use her Dauntless skill, she may increase her Strength characteristc to double that of the nominated target of her Block action.

name: Zolcath the Zoat
specialRules: "Excuse Me, Are You a Zoat?": Once per game, when Zolcath is activated, he may gain the Hypnotic Gaze trait. You must declare this special rule is being used when Zolcath is activated.
